ZMap Changes/Fixes [from cvs]
  • Browse CVS
  • doc/Release_notes/release_notes.2009_12_02.shtml: new zmap release notes for 2 December 2009
  • src/include/ZMap/zmapWebPages.h: update release notes file to release_notes.2009_12_02.shtml
  • doc/Release_notes/LAST_RELEASE_DATE.txt: update last release notes to 02/12/2009
  • src/zmapUtils/zmapUtils_P.h: /var/tmp/zmap.13503/ZMap/scripts/versioner run by zmap
  • src/zmapApp/zmapAppconnect.c: avoid displaying misleading error message.
  • src/zmapFeature/zmapFeatureContext.c: fix revcomp display of assembly path.
  • src/zmapGFF/zmapGFF2parser.c: added warning string to genomic cannonical warning if known name not given - was NULL
  • src/zmapUtils/zmapUtilsSpawn.c: iffed out unused functions: see libpfetch
  • src/: include/ZMap/zmapConfigIni.h, include/ZMap/zmapConfigLoader.h, include/ZMap/zmapConfigStrings.h, zmapConfig/zmapConfigIni.c, zmapUtils/zmapConfigLoader.c: added functions to get style stanzas from list of names
  • src/: include/ZMap/zmapView.h, zmapApp/zmapApp_P.h, zmapServer/zmapServerProtocolHandler.c, zmapServer/zmapServerPrototype.h, zmapServer/pipe/pipeServer.c, zmapServer/pipe/pipeServer_P.h: added code for pipeServer
  • src/zmapView/zmapView.c: fixed bug where multiple servers reqired the first to have sequence=true
  • src/zmapView/zmapViewUtils.c: added code for pipeServer
  • src/zmapFeature/zmapStyleUtils.c: get style stanzas by name
  • src/zmapUtils/zmapUrl.c: added pipe protocol
  • src/zmapApp/zmapAppwindow.c: added + removed scripts_dir from config
  • src/zmapControl/zmapControlWindowMenubar.c: added code for pipeServer

Aceb Changes/Fixes [from cvs]
  • Browse CVS
  • w9/blxview.c: Fixed a bug where text in highlighted rows was not visible. Also made a change to allow coords in the input file to be either way round for the match sequence (because acedb and zmap currently output them different ways for reversed strands).
  • w9/: blixem_.h, blxparser.c, blxview.c, translate.c: Fixed a bug where the input match sequence (which is always the forward strand) was not being complemented if the match is on the reverse strand. Also made a change to allow the coords in the gaps array to be in any order.
  • w9/blxview.c, w9/translate.c, wmake/truemake: remove dependence on translate.c by giface, move sortValues() to it can be linked to blxNN progs.
